sn12.26:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā upavāṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.26:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā upavāṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.26:5.1: “Santi pana, bhante, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.26:5.2: Santi pana, bhante, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā paraṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.26:5.3: Santi pana, bhante, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.26:5.4: Santi pana, bhante, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti.
sn12.26:5.5: Idha no, bhante, bhagavā kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī kathaṃ byākaramānā ca mayaṃ vuttavādino ceva bhagavato assāma, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyāma, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyyāma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn12.26:6.4: Iti vadaṃ vuttavādī ceva me assa, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkheyya, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgaccheyya.
sn12.26:7.1: Tatra, upavāṇa, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.26:7.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12.26:8.1: Tatra, upavāṇa, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sayaṅkataṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
sn12.26:8.4: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ paññapenti, te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṃvedissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
